documentation.text: Commitment is a keccak256 hash of a choice(bool) and a random nonce(uint256)

P1 creates the contract by betting ETHs and making a commitment
 by hashing their choice with a nonce

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cancel Error: Sender is not P1"

arguments.value: Cancel Error: Sender is not P1

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cancel Error: Sender is not P1"

documentation.text:
P1 can terminate the game, if P2 has not bet yet
 Bet amount is returned to P1

P2 makes a predection (true or false)
 P2 bets the same amount as P1
 The game starts after betting and lasts 24 h

P1 reveals the choice and the nonce he used for commitment
 P2 wins if the comparison of the hashes is true

If 24 h has passed without revealing P1 commitment
 P2 can claim both bets
